name: Wind Tempered
summary: You are at home in tempestuous weather and accustomed to even the harshest winds.
description:
You are at home in tempestuous weather and accustomed to even the harshest winds. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against air and electricity effects. If you roll a success on a save against an air effect, you get a critical success instead.Traits

Sylph: Sylphs are planar scions descended from djinn.
